entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is being held by a Death Eater and is screaming in agony.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is the one who dropped Neville and is now threatening Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being threatened by Bellatrix and has to give her the prophecy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy jumps forward to take the prophecy from Harry.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius bursts into the room with other members of the Order.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A Death Eater is holding Neville and drops him when Bellatrix tells them to.
